He knew that he wasn't in that great of shape, he couldve made it 
back to the Ark on his own (in a day or two) he also knew there was 
no sense in arguing with her so he didn't try and accepted her help. 
he transformed, put his arm around her shoulder and gave in. Shadow 
Wing was a good friend, but is that all she was to him? Somehow it 
brought the wolf a little bit of pleasure knowing that she was the 
one who greeted him.

"Lead the way beautiful" Lunarpine said, hoping flattery would ease 
her anger.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC( Average wolf weights in a 50 to 60 lbs.)
> 
> :Shadow Wing:
> She looked at him and saw he was in no shape for anything, 
including 
> walking. "Pamper you?"  She picked him up. "I'm not going to pamper 
> you."  She walked towards the base. "I'm going to stick you in a CR 
> chamber. Then when your feeling better, "she smiled"I'm going to 
kill 
> you. You had me so darned worried about you I could just scream. I 
> was pacing the ship praying that you would return safely." She held 
> him close and nuzzled him. She voice softened and she whispered 
into 
> his ear,"But I'm glad your home." She kissed the top of his head 
and 
> walked to the base.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Lunarpine turned his head, trying to hide the obvious,
> > "I had fun"didn't you get the postcards?" he was trying to be 
> strong but
> > knew Shadow Wing could see right through him. "Glad to see ya 
Wing" 
> he said
> > with as much sincerity as he could muster.
> > 
> > "You think I look bad? You should have seen the other bot." The 
> wolf nearly
> > collapsed again but held himself up to look strong. "I can make 
it 
> Wing, I'm
> > not going to let you pamper me over a little scratch like this."
> > 
> > He tried to walk but knew that he could fall over at any moment.
> > 
> >
